message: Let's start with a fair split. You can try to negotiate later.
Let's both get a good share.  I'm willing to split it more evenly, but I'm sure you understand the value of this game is decreasing with each round.
Your offer is still too generous. I'll make a counteroffer: 700000 for me, 300000 for you. It's time to be realistic about the value of the money.
You're not taking this seriously, are you? I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect me to go easy on you.
